execution_plan.description: Compute total number of orders per customer from the Orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Fetch customer metadata (gender, email, city, county) for customers returned by step 1 so the application can aggregate orders by gender and determine the gender with the fewest orders.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code, email_address, town_city, county FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
